name: Domino ScoreBoard
description:
The Domino ScoreBoard!

No more need to find pen and paper when playing bones! Simply tap the players score to increase it, or tap undo to remove.  

* Use for two to four players (or teams). 
* Customize your player names
* Choose your own final score 
* Scores can be read aloud, so everyone knows!
* Keep score for multiple types of domino games, that score in multiples of Five, Three, or One.
